blocks.name: snmlff
blocks.content: The function ` F ` from ~ snmlval is a mapping from positive integers to real numbers in the range ` [ 0 , 1 ] ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm snmlff(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wf(c0, cn, co(nat0, cicc, nat1))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cn, co(cfv(chash, crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3))), cdiv, cv(s0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wf(c0, cn, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wf(c0, cn, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wf(c0, cn, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), diffsc(s0, c3))
  fmpti(s0, c0, cn, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), co(cfv(chash, crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3))), cdiv, cv(s0)))
  syl3anbrc(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(co(cfv(chash, crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3))), cdiv, cv(s0)), co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wcel(co(cfv(chash, crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3))), cdiv, cv(s0)), cr), wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(chash, crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3))), cdiv, cv(s0))), wbr(co(cfv(chash, crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3))), cdiv, cv(s0)), cle, nat1))
  mpancom(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(co(cfv(chash, crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3))), cdiv, cv(s0)), cr), wcel(cfv(chash, crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3))), cr))
  nndivre(cfv(chash, crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3))), cv(s0))
  syl22anc(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(chash, crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3))), cdiv, cv(s0))), wcel(cfv(chash, crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3))), cr), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(chash, crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3)))), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0)))
  nn0ge0d(cfv(chash, crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3))), wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  divge0(cfv(chash, crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3))), cv(s0))
  mpbird(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wbr(co(cfv(chash, crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3))), cdiv, cv(s0)), cle, nat1), wbr(cfv(chash, crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3))), cle, co(cv(s0), cmul, nat1)))
  breqtrrd(cfv(chash, crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3))), cle, co(cv(s0), cmul, nat1), cv(s0), wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  breqtrd(cfv(chash, crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3))), cle, cv(s0), cfv(chash, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  mpbird(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wbr(cfv(chash, crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3))), cle, cfv(chash, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)))), wbr(crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3)), cdom, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0))))
  mpisyl(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wbr(crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3)), cdom, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0))), wcel(co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), cfn), wss(crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3)), co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0))))
  ssdomg(co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), cfn, crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3)))
  syl2anc(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wb(wbr(cfv(chash, crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3))), cle, cfv(chash, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)))), wbr(crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3)), cdom, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)))), wcel(crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3)), cfn), wcel(co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), cfn))
  hashdom(crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3)), co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), cfn)
  syl(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wceq(cfv(chash, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0))), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cn0))
  nnnn0(cv(s0))
  hashfz1(cv(s0))
  mulid1d(cv(s0), wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  nncn(cv(s0))
  syl112anc(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wb(wbr(co(cfv(chash, crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3))), cdiv, cv(s0)), cle, nat1), wbr(cfv(chash, crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3))), cle, co(cv(s0), cmul, nat1))), wcel(cfv(chash, crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3))), cr), wcel(nat1, cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0)))
  nn0red(cfv(chash, crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3))), wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  syl(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cfv(chash, crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3))), cn0), wcel(crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3)), cfn))
  sylancl(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3)), cfn), wcel(co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), cfn), wss(crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3)), co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0))))
  fzfid(nat1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  ssrab2(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3))
  ssfi(co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3)))
  hashcl(crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3)))
  1red(wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  nnre(cv(s0))
  nngt0(cv(s0))
  ledivmul(cfv(chash, crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3))), nat1, cv(s0))
  elicc01(co(cfv(chash, crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s1))), cmo, c2)), c3))), cdiv, cv(s0)))
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, nat1)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat1, cfz, cv(s0))
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.cfz.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: snmlfval
blocks.content: The function ` F ` from ~ snmlval maps ` N ` to the relative density of ` B ` in the first ` N ` digits of the digit string of ` A ` in base ` R ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm snmlfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), co(cfv(chash, crab(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c0), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c2, cmul, co(c3, cexp, cv(s0))), cmo, c3)), c4))), cdiv, c0)))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s1, cn, co(cfv(chash, crab(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c2, cmul, co(c3, cexp, cv(s0))), cmo, c3)), c4))), cdiv, cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  fvmpt(s1, c0, cn, c1, co(cfv(chash, crab(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c0), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c2, cmul, co(c3, cexp, cv(s0))), cmo, c3)), c4))), cdiv, c0), co(cfv(chash, crab(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c2, cmul, co(c3, cexp, cv(s0))), cmo, c3)), c4))), cdiv, cv(s1)))
  oveq12d(cfv(chash, crab(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c2, cmul, co(c3, cexp, cv(s0))), cmo, c3)), c4))), cdiv, cv(s1), cfv(chash, crab(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c0), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c2, cmul, co(c3, cexp, cv(s0))), cmo, c3)), c4))), c0, wceq(cv(s1), c0))
  fveq2d(chash, crab(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c2, cmul, co(c3, cexp, cv(s0))), cmo, c3)), c4)), crab(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c0), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c2, cmul, co(c3, cexp, cv(s0))), cmo, c3)), c4)), wceq(cv(s1), c0))
  syl(wceq(cv(s1), c0), wceq(crab(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c2, cmul, co(c3, cexp, cv(s0))), cmo, c3)), c4)), crab(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c0), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c2, cmul, co(c3, cexp, cv(s0))), cmo, c3)), c4))), wceq(co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), co(nat1, cfz, c0)))
  oveq2(cv(s1), c0, nat1, cfz)
  rabeq(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), co(nat1, cfz, c0), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c2, cmul, co(c3, cexp, cv(s0))), cmo, c3)), c4))
  id(wceq(cv(s1), c0))
  ovex(cfv(chash, crab(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c0), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c2, cmul, co(c3, cexp, cv(s0))), cmo, c3)), c4))), cdiv, c0)
  diff.cn.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, cfv(chash, crab(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c0), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c2, cmul, co(c3, cexp, cv(s0))), cmo, c3)), c4))), cdiv, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, chash, crab(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c0), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c2, cmul, co(c3, cexp, cv(s0))), cmo, c3)), c4)))
  diff.chash.s(s1)
  diff.crab.s(s1, s0, co(nat1, cfz, c0), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c2, cmul, co(c3, cexp, cv(s0))), cmo, c3)), c4))
  diff.co.s(s1, nat1, cfz, c0)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.cfz.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cfv(cfl, co(co(c2, cmul, co(c3, cexp, cv(s0))), cmo, c3)), c4)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cfl, co(co(c2, cmul, co(c3, cexp, cv(s0))), cmo, c3))
  diff.cfl.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, co(c2, cmul, co(c3, cexp, cv(s0))), cmo, c3)
  diff.co.s(s1, c2, cmul, co(c3, cexp, cv(s0)))
  diff.cmul.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, c3, cexp, cv(s0))
  diff.cexp.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cmo.s(s1)
  diff.cdiv.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat1, cfz, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat1, cfz, c0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: snmlval
blocks.content: The property " ` A ` is simply normal in base ` R ` ". A number is simply normal if each digit ` 0 <_ b < R ` occurs in the base- ` R ` digit string of ` A ` with frequency ` 1 / R ` (which is consistent with the expectation in an infinite random string of numbers selected from ` 0 ... R - 1 ` ). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm snmlval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), w3a(wcel(c2, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c0, cr), wral(s0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c2, cmin, nat1)), wbr(cmpt(s1, cn, co(cfv(chash, crab(s2, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c0, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s2))), cmo, c2)), cv(s0)))), cdiv, cv(s1))), cli, co(nat1, cdiv, c2)))))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s3, cfv(cuz, nat2), crab(s4, cr, wral(s0, co(nat0, cfz, co(cv(s3), cmin, nat1)), wbr(cmpt(s1, cn, co(cfv(chash, crab(s2, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(cv(s4), cmul, co(cv(s3), cexp, cv(s2))), cmo, cv(s3))), cv(s0)))), cdiv, cv(s1))), cli, co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s3)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
  -| diffsc(s4, c0)
  -| diffsc(s4, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), w3a(wcel(c2, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c0, cr), wral(s0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c2, cmin, nat1)), wbr(cmpt(s1, cn, co(cfv(chash, crab(s2, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c0, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s2))), cmo, c2)), cv(s0)))), cdiv, cv(s1))), cli, co(nat1, cdiv, c2))))), diffss(s0, s1))
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), w3a(wcel(c2, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c0, cr), wral(s0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c2, cmin, nat1)), wbr(cmpt(s1, cn, co(cfv(chash, crab(s2, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c0, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s2))), cmo, c2)), cv(s0)))), cdiv, cv(s1))), cli, co(nat1, cdiv, c2))))), diffss(s0, s2))
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), w3a(wcel(c2, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c0, cr), wral(s0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c2, cmin, nat1)), wbr(cmpt(s1, cn, co(cfv(chash, crab(s2, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c0, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s2))), cmo, c2)), cv(s0)))), cdiv, cv(s1))), cli, co(nat1, cdiv, c2))))), diffss(s1, s2))

blocks.name: snmlflim
blocks.content: If ` A ` is simply normal, then the function ` F ` of relative density of ` B ` in the digit string converges to ` 1 / R ` , i.e. the set of occurrences of ` B ` in the digit string has natural density ` 1 / R ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm snmlflim(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, co(nat0, cfz, co(c2, cmin, nat1)))), wbr(c4, cli, co(nat1, cdiv, c2)))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cfv(cuz, nat2), crab(s1, cr, wral(s2, co(nat0, cfz, co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1)), wbr(cmpt(s3, cn, co(cfv(chash, crab(s4, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s3)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(cv(s1), cmul, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s4))), cmo, cv(s0))), cv(s2)))), cdiv, cv(s3))), cli, co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s0)))))))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpt(s3, cn, co(cfv(chash, crab(s4, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s3)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c0, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s4))), cmo, c2)), c3))), cdiv, cv(s3))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c3)
  -| diffsc(s4, c0)
  -| diffsc(s4, c2)
  -| diffsc(s4, c3)
} = {
  sylan(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, co(nat0, cfz, co(c2, cmin, nat1))), wbr(c4, cli, co(nat1, cdiv, c2)), wral(s2, co(nat0, cfz, co(c2, cmin, nat1)), wbr(cmpt(s3, cn, co(cfv(chash, crab(s4, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s3)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c0, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s4))), cmo, c2)), cv(s2)))), cdiv, cv(s3))), cli, co(nat1, cdiv, c2))))
  simp3bi(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wral(s2, co(nat0, cfz, co(c2, cmin, nat1)), wbr(cmpt(s3, cn, co(cfv(chash, crab(s4, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s3)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c0, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s4))), cmo, c2)), cv(s2)))), cdiv, cv(s3))), cli, co(nat1, cdiv, c2))), wcel(c2, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c0, cr))
  snmlval(s2, s3, s4, s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  rspccva(s2, co(nat0, cfz, co(c2, cmin, nat1)), c3, wbr(cmpt(s3, cn, co(cfv(chash, crab(s4, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s3)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c0, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s4))), cmo, c2)), cv(s2)))), cdiv, cv(s3))), cli, co(nat1, cdiv, c2)), wbr(c4, cli, co(nat1, cdiv, c2)))
  breq1d(cmpt(s3, cn, co(cfv(chash, crab(s4, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s3)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c0, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s4))), cmo, c2)), cv(s2)))), cdiv, cv(s3))), cli, co(nat1, cdiv, c2), c4, wceq(cv(s2), c3))
  syl6eqr(cmpt(s3, cn, co(cfv(chash, crab(s4, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s3)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c0, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s4))), cmo, c2)), cv(s2)))), cdiv, cv(s3))), c4, cmpt(s3, cn, co(cfv(chash, crab(s4, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s3)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c0, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s4))), cmo, c2)), c3))), cdiv, cv(s3))), wceq(cv(s2), c3))
  mpteq2dv(s3, cn, co(cfv(chash, crab(s4, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s3)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c0, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s4))), cmo, c2)), cv(s2)))), cdiv, cv(s3)), co(cfv(chash, crab(s4, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s3)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c0, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s4))), cmo, c2)), c3))), cdiv, cv(s3)), wceq(cv(s2), c3))
  oveq1d(cfv(chash, crab(s4, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s3)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c0, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s4))), cmo, c2)), cv(s2)))), cdiv, cv(s3), cfv(chash, crab(s4, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s3)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c0, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s4))), cmo, c2)), c3))), wceq(cv(s2), c3))

  rabbidv(s4, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s3)), wceq(cv(s2), c3), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c0, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s4))), cmo, c2)), cv(s2)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(c0, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s4))), cmo, c2)), c3))
  eqeq2(cv(s2), c3, cfv(cfl, co(co(c0, cmul, co(c2, cexp, cv(s4))), cmo, c2)))
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s1)
  diffss.ex(s4, s0)
  diffss.ex(s4, s1)
  diff.co.s(s2, nat0, cfz, co(c2, cmin, nat1))
  diff.nat0.s(s2)
  diff.cfz.s(s2)
  diff.co.s(s2, c2, cmin, nat1)
  diff.cmin.s(s2)
  diff.wbr.s(s2, c4, cli, co(nat1, cdiv, c2))
  diff.cli.s(s2)

  diff.nat1.s(s2)
  diff.cdiv.s(s2)
  diff.wceq.s(s3, cv(s2), c3)

  diff.wceq.s(s4, cv(s2), c3)
